attributes.action: Make more gender options legally recognised.
attributes.additional_details: We want to make more gender options to make gender queer people feel more included and excepted in the modern day. It is important to except all genders as more people are coming out as it is more accepted by society, to help them further you can make them feel more safe and valid by creating more gender options on legal forms. Non binary people have a life satisfaction of 5.5/10, this might occur form not being recognised by the government.
attributes.background: On documents such as passports, make more gender options available, such as non binary and gender fluid.
